name: V%27Kara
content: Sister V'Kara was a Sarravi female who lived in the Holy City on the moon Jedha during the High Republic Era. Around 382 BBY, V'Kara discovered that the Screen of the Second Sight had been stolen from the Shrine of Sarrav and contacted the Convocation of the Force for help. In response, Jedi Padawan Matthea Cathley and Jedi Vildar Mac were sent to investigate. When they arrived at the shrine, they discovered that V'Kara had been killed by the thief, Tey Sirrek.
